category.discription: Lamb patties which melt in your mouth, and are quick and easy to make. Served hot with a crisp salad.
Lobster Thermidor is a French dish of lobster meat cooked in a rich wine sauce, stuffed back into a lobster shell, and browned.
Deep fry whole potatoes in oil for 8-10 minutes or coat each potato with little oil. Mix the onions, garlic, tomatoes and mushrooms. Add yoghurt, ginger, garlic, chillies, coriander
Chinese rice wok with cabbage, beans, carrots, and spring onions.
